name: bitwarden
tagline: A secure password manager with encrypted vaults and multi-device sync
description: Bitwarden is a secure, open-source password manager with browser, mobile, and desktop clients. It allows self-hosted password vaults, secure sharing, autofill, and zero-knowledge encryption with sync across devices.

features.title: Password Vault Hosting
features.description: Hosts encrypted password vaults for Bitwarden clients

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Ensures only client devices can decrypt stored data

features.title: Multi-User Organizations
features.description: Supports shared vaults for teams and organizations

features.title: Cross-Device Synchronization
features.description: Syncs vault data across desktop and mobile clients

features.title: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: Manages permissions for users and organizations

features.title: API Compatibility
features.description: Maintains compatibility with official Bitwarden clients
